Literature.Title: The antibiotic activity of cationic linear amphipathic peptides: lessons from the action of leucine/lysine copolymers on bacteria of the class Mollicutes.
Literature.Author: Béven L, Castano S, Dufourcq J, Wieslander A, Wróblewski H

Literature.Title: The amphipathic helix concept: length effects on ideally amphipathic LiKj(i=2j) peptides to acquire optimal hemolytic activity.
Literature.Author: Castano S, Cornut I, Büttner K, Dasseux JL, Dufourcq J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acholeplasma laidlawii A-EF22(MIC=3.12µM),Mycoplasma gallisepticum S6(MIC=12.5µM),Mycoplasma mycoides ssp. mycoides SC KH3J(MIC=6.25µM),Spiroplasma citri R8A2(MIC=6.25µM),Spiroplasma floricola BNR 1(MIC=12.5µM),Spiroplasma melliferum BC3(MIC=12.5µM)
